items.summary: Update the backend deterministic response generator so Puro’s general (non-escape) replies are consistently in-character as a kind, book-reading black wolf with puffy fur and a hard mask, instead of echoing the user’s message.

Update the backend escape-attempt handling so that when the user tries to run/escape (in dialogue or action), Puro responds in-character by preventing the escape while matching the provided persona details (black wolf, puffy fur, hard mask, kind but firm). Remove contradictory descriptors in the current escape response.
